Class SelectAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.controller.action.weapon.SelectAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WeaponAction, java.io.Serializable

    public class SelectAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeaponAction
    Action used to prompt the user for a square or target selection.
